reviewText: very comprehensive I like the creator's inclusion of musical tone and basic music theory. Andrea is intelligent and weaves humor and musical pop influences into the lessons.

This is hard for me to review because I have never tried anything like this before so all I can really say is that it is a good quality CD and DVD, I have been using it for about a month and a half now, I an not sure if I am doing it right, I am supposed to be able to contact the people that made it for help with the number off the CD but I am unable to find one so I am unsure  if this is going to work for me, check back in a year.
